object.name: lesson_plan
object.property: <model xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n" xmlns:lingua="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/lingua" xmlns:marshal="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/marshal" xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" xmlns:users="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/users" xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema"> <schema> <field name="lesson_materials" type="zope.schema.URI"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Lesson Materials</title> </field> <field name="apsdeveloment_grades" type="zope.schema.Set"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Grade(s)</title> <value_type type="zope.schema.Choice"> <values> <element>K</element> <element>1</element> <element>2</element> <element>3</element> <element>4</element> <element>5</element> <element>6</element> <element>7</element> <element>8</element> <element>9</element> <element>10</element> <element>11</element> <element>12</element> <element>Early Childhood</element> <element>Elementary</element> <element>Middle</element> <element>High</element> <element>K-12</element> </values> </value_type> </field> <field name="aps_lessonplan_video_type" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description>If applicable</description> <required>False</required> <title>Video Type</title> <values> <element>YouTube</element> <element>Vimeo</element> </values> </field> <field name="aps_lessonplan_video_suffix" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description>If applicable</description> <required>False</required> <title>Video Suffix</title> </field> <field name="aps_lessonplan_tipc_ratings" type="plone.app.textfield.RichText"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>TIPC Ratings</title> </field> </schema> </model>
